channel.title: PSP help
channel.description: ok i got a psp n its already modded.. all i wanted to know was what file format does the game have to be when i download it ..iso or cso? and do u juss extract the file or files n drag them onto the memory stick..? thx in advance :)

item.title: PSP help
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:20, topic:199874”][quote author=darkilla link=topic=264543.msg2188654#msg2188654 date=1208278324]
ok so which one of u are right lol :S
cooper or teh spade…?
sorry bout all the questions im new to this hackin/modding stuff
[/quote]
I think they were both saying the same thing. Basically create a file called ISO in the root directory of your psp;s memory stick.[/quote]
Yep, same thing. Congrats on cm!

Read full topic

item.title: PSP help
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Put it in X:/ISO when X being your memorystick drive letter when plugging your PSP into the computer.

Read full topic

item.title: PSP help
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

No, make an iso folder named iso, then put them in there

Read full topic

oo alright thx ppl… so i juss put the iso/cso file in the main part of the memory stick…

item.title: PSP help
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:14, topic:199874”][quote author=cooper link=topic=264543.msg2188011#msg2188011 date=1208241873]

Sorry if i misread but it sounds like your downloading games? Link 2 site plz i want me games.

Not allowed, but i will give you a hint: psp + iso + .com without any plus signs.

ohhhhhhh ok, whats a plus sign?

[/quote]
oh cul i removed the pluse+simbols and it brawt frell to pwetty site.

Ill look around there later, my mem stick is only 1gig right now, might not be enough for a game.[/quote]
More than enough usually. I want to put Renegade squadron back on but I’d need to get rid of some other games.

Read full topic

item.title: PSP help
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

The home folder of the Memory Stick Pro Duo. Like what you would be linked to if you opened your PSP from My Computer.

Read full topic

@darkilla wrote:

what exactly is the root :S

item.title: PSP help
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

You should make an ISO folder in the root. Then place the file in there.

Read full topic

item.title: PSP help
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:5, topic:199874”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=264543.msg2186924#msg2186924 date=1208221887]
Sorry I don’t know. There are probably be people here who can help you but I’d just like to ask why you asked that question in these forums? I mean it would be a better idea to go to an actual PSP modding community and ask them; I am sure they will have a lot more knowledge on the matter and they are usually only a google search away.
[/quote]

If you didn’t know, why did you bother replying? You were a huge help to him.[/quote]
Well I thought he may not have realised that he would get a wider range of answer and help at a community based around what he is having problems with. Sorry dude.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:

davidude36:

Sorry I don’t know. There are probably be people here who can help you but I’d just like to ask why you asked that question in these forums? I mean it would be a better idea to go to an actual PSP modding community and ask them; I am sure they will have a lot more knowledge on the matter and they are usually only a google search away.

If you didn’t know, why did you bother replying? You were a huge help to him.
